column4: Anyone have any hints to installing Ubuntu, or more specifically Kubuntu on a Mac?
Anyone have any hints to installing Ubuntu, or more specifically Kubuntu on a Mac? Is there any support for silly things like EFI?
if you want linux on mac you need yellowdog
is it one of the later intel mac or an older ppc one?
the yellowdog thing seems to be only for powerpc things, and it is based off downloading a different older version?
